course_title: Freshman Seminar:Biology: Science of our Social Brains
class_notes: This seminar will explore the neurobiological basis for a wide range of our social behaviors by learning from scientific research conducted in animals and humans.  We will discuss how love begins, why it is possible to fall in love with the `wrong多 person, how 多mirror多 neurons help us understand the actions of others, and how does the brain多s ability to change with experience impact our social biases.
